name: Super Hero Sound Effects
description:
With hundreds of high quality Super Hero noises and sound effects, you can play the perfect noise or sound effect at the exact right moment! Fly around with flying noises! Block bullets and hear people cheer you on!

Have you ever wanted to walk into a room and play the perfect explosion or Super Hero sound effect for everyone to hear? You have hundreds to choose from!

Super Hero Sound Effects helps you do just that! And more!

Super Hero Sound Effects comes with:
- Intro Movie Sound Effects
- Super Hero Music
- Flying and Whooshing Sounds
- Bullets, Glass, Debris Sound Effects
- Body Hitting Sounds
- Guns and Bullet Sound Effects
- People Cheering and Clapping
- (Pro Version Only) Additional Super Hero Sound Effects


Play multiple sound effects at once to make the perfect noises for you and your friends to hear!

Super Hero Sound Effects Features:
- Hundreds of ultra high quality sound effects, jingles, songs, and more
- iPhone, iPad, iPod touch compatible
- Graphics designed for Retina displays - no fuzziness
- Available for iOS 5.1+
